caption: What started as an idea walking to class at Western Kentucky University in 1995 after listening to @goodiemob turned into a career most could only dream of. There’s so much talent coming out of my hometown Louisville, KY and as I type this I know how hard it is to actually make it out. I’m truly blessed to have Gov. Patton recognize our efforts at that time and also the Mayor of Atlanta @andreforatlanta  recognize  September 16th as #NappyRootsDay The feeling is still surreal and I thank everyone who has been on this journey with us. The good times and the not so great moments is what life is actually about and I appreciate every second of them all. #KeepItNappy and listen to our catalog on shuffle over a cold #CraftBeer this afternoon and #PayIfForward some how… #LovePeaceAndNappyness #WKU #Nappy4Life #CraftyRappers #TheCoolest #FkItGang #NappyRoots #KYRaised #Awnaw #PoFolks #GoodDay #NoStatic #Ride #HomeFried  #KissTheSky dropping this Friday 9.20.24!!!!
